domain.name: Person

domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

text: @realDonaldTrump If Donald Trump paid as much attention to doing his job as he pays to watching cable news and Tweeting, 128K Americans wouldn’t have died from #CoronaVirus, the US military wouldn’t have a Taliban/Russian bounty on their heads and 30 Million Americans wouldn’t be unemployed. 🤡
